alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 6:34PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of Rutland and Windsor Counties through 715 PM EST... At 634 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds over Poultney Village, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rutland, Chester, Woodstock, Killington, Ludlow Village, Rutland City, Wallingford, Rutland - Southern Vermont Airport, Benson, Pomfret, Plymouth, Hartland, West Rutland, Ira, West Castleton, Mount Holly, Poultney Village, Mount Tabor, Shrewsbury and Danby. This includes the following highways... Interstate 89 between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 91 between mile markers 39 and 49, between mile markers 58 and 60, and between mile markers 63 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
